buttons.cssCode: #buttonAnimation1{font-size: 1.25em;color: #000;background-color: #1197cc;box-shadow: #094c66 4px 4px 0px;border-radius: 0.5rem;transition: transform 200ms, box-shadow 200ms;cursor: pointer;text-align: center;outline:none;border: none;height: 2.8125rem;margin: 1px 3px;padding: 0.652rem 1.25rem;}#buttonAnimation1:active{transform: translateY(4px) translateX(4px);box-shadow: #094c66 0px 0px 0px;}

#buttonAnimation9{cursor:pointer;background:transparent;position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%, -50%);margin:0 auto;border:none;font-size:20px;padding:15px 30px;color:#000;} #buttonAnimation9::before, #buttonAnimation9::after{content:'';width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;box-sizing:border-box;transition: top 0.5s, left 0.5s}#buttonAnimation9::before{border-left:2px solid #f4005c;border-top:2px solid #f4005c;}#buttonAnimation9::after{border-right:2px solid #f4005c;border-bottom:2px solid #f4005c;}#buttonAnimation9:hover::before{top:-4px;left:-10px}#buttonAnimation9:hover::after{top:4px;left:10px}

#button11{background-color: rgb(255,81,119);color:white;padding: 0.5rem 1rem;font-size: large;border:none;border-radius: 5px;cursor:pointer;background-image: linear-gradient(-60deg, #ffffff00 0%,#ffffff00 40%,#ffffff44 40%,#ffffff44 60%,#ffffff00 60%,#ffffff00 100%);background-size: 200% 100%;background-position-x: 150%;transition: scale 0.5s;}#button11:hover{animation: shimmer 1s forwards;scale:1.1;}@keyframes shimmer{0%{background-position-x: 150%;}100%{background-position-x: -50%;}}

#button12{position:relative;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;font-size:20px;background:#2e3715;color:white;border-radius: 15px 15px 15px 15px;border:none;width:140px;height:40px;overflow:hidden;cursor:pointer;transition: background-color: 0.8s;}#button12:hover{background:#afddcc;color:black;transition: background 0.8s;}#button12-text{position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform: translate(-50%,-50%);transition: all 0.8s;}#button12-download{position:absolute;top:200%;left:50%;transform: translate(-50%,-50%);transition: all 0.8s;}#button12:hover #button12-download{top:50%;}#button12:hover #button12-text{top:-200%;}

#button13{border:0;cursor:pointer;position:relative;}#button13-box{background-color: rgb(255,70,85);padding:0.5rem 2rem; position:relative;overflow:hidden;}#button13-anchor{position:relative;text-decoration:none;font-size:1.4rem;font-weight:700;color:#ece8e1;text-transform:uppercase;z-index:1;}#button13::before, #button13::after{content: '';position: absolute;width: 105%;height:50%;background-color: transparent;border: 1px solid rgb(134,129,124);left:-3%;z-index: -1;}#button13::before{border-bottom: 0;top:-10%;}#button13::after{border-top: 0;bottom:-10%;}#button13-span{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:120%;height:110%;background-color:#2c303d;transform:translateX(-105%) skew(-10deg);transition: 0.8s ease;}#button13:hover #button13-span{transform: translateX(-5%) skew(-10deg);}

loaders.cssCode: .loader1{display:flex;justify-content: space-between;align-items:center;gap:8px;width:60px;height:40px;}.loader1-bar{height:40px;display:flex;width:10px;height:6px;border-radius:8px;background:orange;animation: audio-wave 2.2s infinite ease-in-out;}.loader1-bar:nth-child(2){left:11px;animation-delay: 0.2s;}.loader1-bar:nth-child(3){left:22px;animation-delay:0.4s;}.loader1-bar:nth-child(4){left:33px;animation-delay: 0.6s;}.loader1-bar:nth-child(5){left:44x;animation-delay: 0.8s;}.loader1-bar:nth-child(5){left:55px;animation-delay: 1s;}@keyframes audio-wave{0%{height: 6px;transform: translateY(0px);background: #ff8e3a;}25%{height: 40px;transform: translateY(-5px) scaleY(1.7);background: #ed509e;}50%{height: 6px;transform: translateY(0px);background: #9c73f8;}100%{height: 6px;transform: translateY(0px);background: #0fccce;}}

cards.styleCss: .card-container{width: 70%;height: 15rem;display:flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center;flex-wrap: wrap;gap: 0;border: 2px solid;border-color: #31acff;box-shadow: rgba(92, 240, 248, 0.6) 0px 0px 12px 1.2px;backdrop-filter: blur(10px);border-radius: 1.25rem;margin: 0 7px;}.card-logo{width: 100%;padding: 10px;font-size: 1.6em;display:flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center;color: white;}.card-text-container{width:100%;height: 8rem;text-align: center;color: white;}.card-title{display: block;padding: 0 0 1rem 0;font-size: 0.8rem;}.card-paragraph{font-size: 0.7em;padding:0 1rem;}@media only screen and (min-width:512px) {.card-container{width: 16rem;}}@media only screen and (min-width: 794px){.card-title{font-size: 1.1em;}.card-logo{font-size: 2.5em;}.card-paragraph{font-size: 0.7em;}}@media only screen and (min-width:1024px) {.card-container{width: 17rem;height: 17rem;}.card-title{font-size: 1.2em;}.card-text-container{height: 10rem;}.card-logo{font-size: 3em;}.card-paragraph{font-size: 0.7em;padding: 0 2rem;}}

cards.cssCode: .wrapper{border-radius:15px;box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);width: 300px;htight: 300px;overflow: hidden;cursor: pointer;position: relative;}.wrapper-image{width: 100%;height:100%;object-fit: cover;transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;}.wrapper-image:hover{transform: scale(1.4);filter:blur(5px);}.wrapper:hover .wrapper-title{opacity:1;}.wrapper-title{opacity: 0;border-radius: 5px;background: rgba(219,217,217,0.368);padding: 15px;position:absolute;color:black;bottom:40px;left: 4px;right: 4px;font-size: 23px;font-weight: 600;text-align:center;margin-top:10px;transition: opacity 0.5 ease-in-out;}

cards.htmlCode:
Tommy Shelby
@ShelbyCompany
cards.cssCode: .card2{width:300px;aspect-radio: 1/1.3;position:relative;}.image-box2{width:100%;height:100%;overflow:hidden;}.image-box2-img{display:block;width:100%;height:100%;object-fit:cover;filter:grayscale(0) birghtness(1);scale: 1.2;transition:scale 2s ease-in-out, filter 1s ease-in-out;}.image-box2-img:hover{filter:grayscale(1) brightness(0.7);scale: 1;}.text-box2{position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform: translate(-50%,-50%);text-align:center;color:white;}.text-box2 :is(.main-card2, .sub-card2){height: 34px;line-height: 34px;overflow:hidden;}.main-card2{font-size: 18px;font-weight: 600;text-transform: uppercase;position:relative;}.sub-card2{font-size:14px;font-weight:300;}.name-card2, .address-card2{display:block;transition: transform 0.5 ease;}.name-card2{transition-delay: 0.2s;transform: translateY(100%);}.address-card2{transform: translateY(-100%);transition-delay: 0.5s}.card2:hover .text-box2 :is(span){transform: translateY(0%);}.text-box2::after{position:absolute;content:'';top: 52%;left:50%;width: 180%;height: 3px;transform: translate(-50%,-50%) scaleX(0);transform-origin: left;transition: 0.5 ease;background-color: cyan;}.card2:hover .text-box2::after{transform: translate(-50%,-50%) scaleX(1);}

slidesCode.htmlCode:
<

Title

>
slidesCode.cssCode: .carrousel {display: flex;flex-direction: row;width: 100%;max-width: 100rem;margin-top: 8dvh;height: 92dvh;background-color:rgba(186, 186, 186, 0.8);position: relative;}.back {top: 0;left: 0;}.back:link, .forth:link{background: transparent;}.backward,.forward {background: grey;border-radius: 10px;padding: 5px 10px;text-align: center;color: black;:focus{outline:none;}}.backward:hover,.forward:hover {background: rgb(68, 68, 68);}.forth {top: 0;right: 0;}.button-carousel {display: flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center;position: absolute;width: 100px;height: 100%;font-size: 35px;font-weight: bold;background: transparent;cursor: pointer;z-index: 1;}.carrousel-image {width: 100%;height: 100%;object-fit: cover;transition: all 0.5s;cursor: pointer;}.picture {object-fit: cover;position: relative;width: 100%;height: 100%;}.carousel-title {display: flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center; position: absolute;bottom: 0;right: 0;width: 100%;margin: 0 auto;padding: 0 20px;height: 60px;font-size: 1.5rem;z-index: 1;background: rgba(186, 186, 186, 0.8);color: black;}
slidesCode.jsCode: const carousel = document.querySelector('.carrousel'); const carouselTitle = document.querySelector('.carousel-title'); let currentPosition = 0; const buttonBackward = document.querySelector('.backward').addEventListener('click', (e) => Backward()); /* Carousel button to go backward */ const carrouselImage = document.querySelector('.carrousel-image'); /*Carousel picture container*/ const picture = document.querySelector('.picture'); /* Carousel picture*/ const buttonForward = document.querySelector('.forward').addEventListener('click', (e) => Forward()); /*Carousel button to go forward*/ const checkMobile = window.matchMedia('screen and (max-width: 992px)').matches; /*creating a breakpoint media for mobile*/ picture.addEventListener('click', (e) => { /*if picture is clicked movie content will be displayed*/ showMovieContent(e.target.id);}); //------------------------------function to go back to previous image------------------------------------// function Backward() {if (currentPosition <= 0) { /* if movie is in the first position, counter goes to last position*/ currentPosition = myJson.top5.length - 1;} else {currentPosition--; // substract 1 to counter} //----Media conditional for mobile in order to show mobile pcitures----// if (window.matchMedia('screen and (max-width: 992px)').matches) { showCarrouselImage(myJson.top5[currentPosition].imageUrl , myJson.top5[currentPosition].id,myJson.top5[currentPosition].title);} else { showCarrouselImage(myJson.top5[currentPosition].image2Url,myJson.top5[currentPosition].id , myJson.top5[currentPosition].title);}} //----function to go forward to next image-----// function Forward() {if (currentPosition >= myJson.top5.length - 1) { /*if movie is in the last position, counter goes to 0*/ currentPosition = 0;} else {currentPosition++; /* add 1 to counter*/} //----------------------Media conditional for mobile in order to show mobile pcitures------------------// if (window.matchMedia('screen and (max-width: 992px)').matches) { showCarrouselImage(myJson.top5[currentPosition].imageUrl , myJson.top5[currentPosition].id , myJson.top5[currentPosition].title); } else { showCarrouselImage(myJson.top5[currentPosition].image2Url , myJson.top5[currentPosition].id , myJson.top5[currentPosition].title);}} /*function to set attributes in order to show the current image within the carousel*/ function showCarrouselImage(url, id, alt) {picture.setAttribute('id', id); picture.setAttribute('src', url); picture.setAttribute('alt', alt); carouselTitle.textContent = alt;} //-------------------Fuction to change forward the carousel images every 7 seconds-------------------// function runCarrousel() {setInterval(Forward, 5000);}

slidesCode.cssCode: .carousel-secondContent{position:relative;width:320px;margin:100px auto 0 auto;perspective:2000px;}.carousel{position:absolute;width:100%;height:100%;transform-style:preserve-3d;animation:rotate360 60s infinite forwards linear;}.image{position:absolute;border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.7);width:300px;height:187px;top:20px;left:10px;right:10px;background-size:cover;box-shadow:inset 0 0 0 2000px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);display:flex}.image > span{margin:auto;font-size:2rem;} @keyframes rotate360{from{transform: rotateY(0deg);}to{transform: rotateY(-360deg);}}.image:nth-child(1){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(0deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(2){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(40deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(3){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(80deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(4){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(120deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(5){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(160deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(6){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(200deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(7){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(240deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(8){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(280deg) translateZ(430px)}.image:nth-child(9){background: lightblue; transform: rotateY(320deg) translateZ(430px)}

modalCode.cssCode: .notification {position:absolute;padding:5px;height:50px;bottom:4px;right:4px;width:max-content;border-radius:6px;background-color:#313e2c;color:#aaec8a;box-shadow: 0 1px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);transform: translateY(30px);opacity:0;visibility: hidden; animation: fade-in 3s linear;} .notification_icon{height:26px;width:26px;margin-right: 4px;} .notification_body{display:flex; flex-direction: row; align-items: center; padding: 16px 8px;} .notification_progress{position:absolute; left:4px; bottom:4px; width: calc(100% - 8px); height: 3px; transform: scaleX(0); transform-origin: left; background: linear-gradient(to right, #313e2c, #aaec8a); border-radius: inherit; animation: progress 2.5s 0.3s linear;} @keyframes fade-in{5% {opacity: 1; visibility:visible;transform:translateY(0);}95%{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0);}} @keyframes progress {to{transform: scaleX(1);}}

.clipboard{border: 0.5px solid black;color: white;background: rgb(156, 255, 7);border-radius: 10px;position:absolute;bottom: 4px;right:4px;z-index: 1;animation: fade-in 3s linear;}@keyframes fade-in{5% {opacity: 1; visibility:visible;transform:translateY(0);}95%{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0);}} @keyframes progress {to{transform: scaleX(1);}}
